website_summaries.verdict: A huge hit with young Power Rangers fans, its interchangeable parts and morph capabilities make this well worth its price.
pros: Colorful and well-built, with the ability to be turned into different types of Zords (although it doesn’t separate into individual Zords)
cons: Limited to a couple of different morphs
Lots of small pieces and parts that can get lost

customer_reviews.title: Approved by 5 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what this is, but my 5 year old nephew squealed with joy when he received this for his birthday. Seems like a lot of pieces, so I'm not sure how happy his mom is with the gift. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sara K.

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing wrong with the product itself per say ...
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing wrong with the product itself per say. Just make sure that your child is willing to play with it for more than one day especially for the price. I think for us we wish it did more than what it actually does to keep him engaged.
customer_reviews.author: Natoshia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: This can exactly as expected. All the pieces there included and my son loved it. I think it should be $5-$10 cheaper but was comparable to everywhere else.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to power rangers collection.

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift- the boy Freaked out!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are not into these toys, but I knew a boy whose birthday party we were invited to, was. So, I ordered it. He almost leapt out of his skin; upon opening it. It was a real treat to see him in a state of happiness. He held it up and said "I've wanted this my WHOLE life!" (He was 9, so it got a chuckle from all the adults in the room!)

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift ever

I received my order sooner than expected. Product was exactly as described; quality was outstanding. I would definitely recommend this seller.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!

customer_reviews.title: Grandson

customer_reviews.title: Power Rangers Deluxe Magazord Samuria Gigazord
customer_reviews.text: I actually thought this left a little something to be desired. My son has the other Power Ranger Megasords and loves playing with them. This one has fewer details and is harder to put together. The pieces do not snap together as easily. This toy is nice for the person who wants to give the appearance of the Gigazord without having to spend a small fortune on all of the separate parts. I just think it lacks playability for children because of the difficulty snapping the pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Megazords rock our world
customer_reviews.text: My boys absolutely love all megazords, and this one is no exception. These are one of the few toys my 2 boys play with *together* (4 & 7) and they're a hit during playdates. The toys have led my children to watch the show, which is hysterical in so many way (intended and not intended). They actually USE the toys in the show, the toys themselves, and it's divine. I will always recommend megazords as some of the most interesting, entertaining, and long-lived toys that exist. My 9 year old daughter even enjoys them from time to time. If we'd had them when she was younger, she'd definitely have been all over them.
customer_reviews.author: Miki H

product_meta.title: Power Rangers Deluxe Megazord Samurai Gigazord
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 The Bandai Power Rangers Deluxe Megazord Samurai Gigazord warrior toy faithfully captures the awesome power of the giant transforming samurai robot featured in Power Rangers. This colorful and impressively statured figure offers two transformation modes, allowing kids to play with the toy as a samurai robot or spaceship. Or, they can combine it with other Zord vehicles and figures to create the unique Ultrazord (each sold separately). With its rotating arms, articulating claws, and katana sword, the Samurai Gigazord offers mighty morphin' fun for ages four and up.

Megazord stands over 1 foot tall in samurai mode. View larger.CHANGES FROM SAMURAI ROBOT TO SPACESHIP
 The Samurai Gigazord comes as a sleek samurai robot warrior, but can quickly be transformed into an impressive spaceship. In its robot form, the figure stands approximately 1 foot tall and is enhanced by moveable arms, a spinning blaster wheel, attachable articulating claw accessories, and a katana sword that can be held in either hand or stored on its waist.

 When it's time for the samurai robot to fly into battle, the figure transforms into a mammoth spaceship. In just a few easy steps, kids can detach and reconfigure the arms and legs and reposition the claws for a striking spaceship design.

COMBINE WITH OTHER FIGURES TO CREATE ULTRAZORD
 For enhanced fun, the Samurai Gigazord can be combined with select Power Rangers Zord vehicles and figures to create the ultimate weapon--the Ultrazord (each sold separately). Choose from a variety of items in the ZordBuilder Collection and snap them to the Samurai Megazord's body to create your own unique hero. For guidance, a step-by-step instruction sheet is included demonstrating a variety of figure combinations.

 This figure is not as sophisticated as some other transforming robots on the market, and its articulation is limited--only its arms rotate. However, the transformation process is easy to accomplish as kids need only pull, snap, and attach the various appendages and accessories to change the basic configuration. Because of its ease of use and imaginative design, the Samurai Megazord makes for a versatile toy to play with and relive your favorite Power Rangers moments.

ABOUT POWER RANGERS
 Appealing to a global audience since 1993, Power Rangers has become an international phenomenon. Airing in more than 40 markets worldwide and offering more than 700 episodes to date, the show emphasizes the importance of teamwork, personal responsibility, physical fitness, and helping those in need. Power Rangers chronicles the exciting adventures of ordinary young people who morph into extraordinary superheroes to work together in solving challenges.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 Power Rangers Deluxe Megazord Samurai Gigazord, claw accessories, katana sword, and instructions.

AT A GLANCE:
 * Samurai Gigazord offers three play modes
 * Morphs from samurai warrior to spaceship
 * Can be combined with additional figures in ZordBuilder Collection (sold separately)
 * Includes articulating claw accessories and katana sword
 * Stands approximately 1 foot tall in samurai mode

AGE/WEIGHT REQUIREMENTS:
 * Four years and up

ASSEMBLY REQUIREMENTS:
 * No assembly required
